title: Global Third-party Logistics Market Size To Worth USD 2247.95 Billion By 2032 | CAGR of 8.3% - GlobeNewswire
summary: The global third-party logistics (3PL) market is expected to grow significantly in the coming years, reaching USD 2,247.95 billion by 2032. This growth is driven by factors such as increasing e-commerce activity, the need for efficient supply chains, and the expansion of manufacturing industries in Asia-Pacific. Key players in the 3PL market include BDP International, Burris Logistics, C.H. Robinson Worldwide, Inc., and FedEx, among others.
